ygData.subject: Re: No More Sash Cheats...
ygData.msgSnippet: O.K., my main thing is that I dont care how I get the sashes as long as I earn them! So if i can have a free monk turn the stuff in thats fine with me, ill
ygData.messageBody:
O.K., my main thing is that I dont care how I get the sashes as long as I
earn them! So if i can have a free monk turn the stuff in thats fine with
me, ill have my friend create a free monk to turn the stuff in and get me
the sash but is there a level restriction?
Say i get all the things needed for the orange or red sashes and give them
to my friend, will they still give him the stuff or say no he's too low
level being first and i lose all the gear etc...? If thats the case Ill have
to "hire" a monk in the game which could be a risky deal even if they had
the sash in question.
